import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useForm, } from "react-hook-form"; const Formwithhook = () => { const [userInfo, setUserinfo] = useState() const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm() const Submit = (data) => { setUserinfo(data) console.log(data) } console.log(errors) return (
